name: Fractured Hearts (demo)
description: “There are no two people who are completely identical in the entire world. Although, if there's something that everyone has experienced, at least once in their lives, it's having a certain sadness in their heart, a scar that never healed, some grudge in which they want justice or revenge.” The game tells the story of four characters. What do they all have in common? A deep pain in their hearts that takes over their lives and makes it hard for them to let go of their pasts. What does their futures hold? Salvation, forgiveness and happiness, or complete surrender to the despair over their pasts? It's up to you to bring the end of this story.
